short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: VideoSyncer is the easiest way to keep track of all the TV series you're watching online
short.de: Mit VideoSyncer kannst du deine online TV Serien ganz einfach verwalten

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wondered where you left off watching your favorite online video series?
Well, then fear no more!
VideoSyncer is here to help you, it will

- keep track of your progress
- allow you to jump right back in
- enable you synchronize your data between mobile and desktop
